\u0c32\u0c15\u0c4d\u0c37\u0c23\u0c3e\u0c: Initially, leaves start to display bright yellow spots or bands on a single shoot. As the disease spreads, these symptoms appear on leaves of all shoots.
\u0c1f\u0c4d\u0c30\u0c3f\u0c17\u0c4d\u0c: Infected branches transmit the virus when used as slips for grafting. The virus can also be transmitted through the roots.
\u0c1c\u0c40\u0c35 \u0c28\u0c3f\u0c2f\u0: Virus cannot be cured. The affected tree should be removed to prevent spreading to other trees.
\u0c28\u0c3f\u0c35\u0c3e\u0c30\u0c23\u0c: Do not use slips from infected trees for grafting.
